meanings.definition: Showing care or concern for someone's well-being
meanings.sent1: Her solicitousness nature always made sure everyone felt included.
meanings.sent2: The nurse's solicitousness towards her patients was truly heartwarming.
meanings.sent3: His solicitousness for his pet fish led him to throw a birthday party for it.
meanings.sent4: The solicitousness of the sun, ensuring all plants receive its light, is like a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: The solicitousness of the teacher made the students feel safe and supported.

meanings.definition: Eager or anxious to do something
meanings.sent1: The child's solicitousness to open his birthday presents was adorable.
meanings.sent2: She was filled with solicitousness to start her new job and make a good impression.
meanings.sent3: His solicitousness to eat the entire cake in one sitting was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The solicitousness of the squirrel gathering nuts before winter is a lesson in preparedness.
meanings.sent5: The solicitousness of the athlete before the big game was palpable.
